column5: Gotta roll up the rim coffee last week and the hut is pulled off the lake, bring on the summer!
Yup, sure is! Heard my first Red Winged Blackbird yesterday!! To me thats a sure sign of good things to come in the weather department!!! Bring it on!

Spring cant come soon enough.  We are definitely getting a taste of it now and for the next 4 or 5 days!  I know we haven't seen the last of snow, but winter's days are numbered!! Dreaming of warm days on the open water......ahhh...that's better!! LOL.
March Madness (College basketball tournament) Selection Sunday is today!
